title: FF Din Cyrillic?
content: My client uses FF Din for everything, and now I should design a brochure in Russian... I haven't been able to find a Cyrillic version of the font, does anybody know if there is one (Mac)? Alternatively, can you suggest a replacement?
author: mili

comments.content: Paratype sells a Cyrillic " [DIN Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20120109081421/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?search=DIN+Condensed&fcode=PT_DNC)". But if you need more weights, their [ITC Officina Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20120109081421/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/default.asp?search=ITC+Officina+Sans&fcode=PT_OSN) might be a good replacement.
Thank you for both the font tip and for the place to find it.
